code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/workshops.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WS_Card=_ref=>{let{id,title,description,image,status}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card d-flex flex-row align-items-center p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:description}),status==="upcoming"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-secondary",disabled:true,children:"Coming Soon"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/${id}`,className:"btn btn-primary",children:"View Workshop"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"workshop-image-container ms-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:title,className:"workshop-image"})})]})});};export default WS_Card;
